data.name: Project Lilith Alpha Demo Preview
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

The Alpha Preview Build is LIVE !


About the Game

Project Lilith Alpha Preview Build is here !

You can test out what've accomplished so far since announcing the game. Main focus of this demo is to test out the combat mechanics and general combat flow. The demo is no way meant to showcase final look or feel of the game.
data.about_the_game:
Project Lilith Alpha Preview Build is here !

You can test out what've accomplished so far since announcing the game. Main focus of this demo is to test out the combat mechanics and general combat flow. The demo is no way meant to showcase final look or feel of the game.
data.short_description: Test out the combat mechanics today !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 | AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements are subject to change during the development of the game.
